type: Concept
description: Workplace safety refers to the conditions and practices that prevent harm, injury, or accidents in a work environment. relation: workplace safety --[Improved By]-> AI--description:AI can improve workplace safety by taking on hazardous or physically demanding tasks, reducing the risk of injury for human workers.-- relation: workplace safety --[Affects]-> Job Market--description:Workplace safety is an important consideration in the evolving job market, as it impacts the skills and training needed for workers to thrive.-- name: AI
